title: Profile
subtitle: You can edit all your information here.

githubAccount.title: Github account
githubAccount.subtitle: To change your username or email, edit your account on Github, then resync your account.

contactEmail.title: Contact Contact Email
contactEmail.subtitle: This email address will be used to receive notifications. Ensure it is up-to-date to stay informed.

notificationSettings.title: Notification Preferences
notificationSettings.subtitle: Customize your notification settings to stay informed about important updates.
notificationSettings.weeklySummaryTooltip: The Weekly Summary Email is a digest that consolidates all notifications into a single email sent every week.

billingProfile.label: Billing Profile
billingProfile.content: Manage your billing profile with notifications for document verification and identity checks.

marketing.label: Marketing
marketing.content: Get alerts about upcoming events and community calls by joining the marketing list.

project.label: Project
project.content: Stay informed about project-related updates, including assigned and available issues.

reward.label: Reward
reward.content: Receive updates on all stages of your rewards, from receipt to payment.

contributors.label: Project x Contributors
contributors.content: Receive notifications about new applications and contributions from contributors.

program.label: Project x Program
program.content: Get updates on new grants and committee applications within your programs.

contact.title: Contact information
contact.subtitle: Please enter only your social networks handle (no links, no @ needed).

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.subtitle: Rank from most to least proficient.
